description:
Check all vignettes of a package by running
Sweave (or other custom weave function) and/or
Stangle (or other custom tangle function) on them.
All R source code files found after the tangling step are
sourceed to check whether all code can be
executed without errors.
example_call: checkVignettes(package, dir, lib.loc = NULL, tangle = TRUE, weave = TRUE,
